posts.post_content:
***SOLD***

I’m looking for a PSA or SGC-graded 4-5 Lajoie portrait. I’m willing to pay market, but they’re impossible to find lately. If willing to sell, please shoot me front and back pics, and a price at [url]gijoemonterey@yahoo.com[/url]. I’ll pay PP Goods, or FF if you have 2+ vouches. At request, I can produce 3-5 references from past sales over $1k.

Thanks!

PM sent.

Sent from my SM-N950U using Tapatalk
I don’t know how to open private messages, but I did see the front pic. I’m definitely interested. Can you send a back pic to my email? I saw your price. Thanks!
